Description: Position Title:             Chief Process EngineerEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                      all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus annual flight ticket and company carJob Location:             RAK, UAEAbout the Client: They are a start-up investment company that will launch 7 factories covering different industries namely in Construction and Plant Fertilizing.Job Description: § Collect and analyse essential data to identify opportunities for improvements and modifications within the NPK Plant processes.§ Utilize process simulation software and scientific principles to develop and implement the most efficient production methods in the NPK Plant.§ Conduct thorough testing of new processes to ensure their reliability and effectiveness in the NPK Plant environment.§ Oversee the procurement and installation of equipment, ensuring compliance with specifications and operational capacities.§ Ensure a safe working environment by assessing safety and environmental issues, while also complying with health and safety legislation and regulations in all plant operations.Skills
Skills: § Must have 2 years of experience in the same role and industry is preferred

Data.Job Location: Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates
